title: Mullvad VPN | 5 Devices for 6 Months | Protect Your Privacy with Easy-To-Use Security VPN Service
description: Protect your online privacy with a Mullvad VPN. Choose the monthly or yearly plan that works for you. This VPN activation code covers 5 devices from your computer to your phone. To improve your privacy further, our VPN service keeps no activity logs and will not ask for personal information from you. When Mullvad VPN is turned on, your connection to our servers is encrypted to the highest standards. Compatible with devices using Windows 10 or higher, MacOS Mojave (10.14+), and Linux distributions like Debian 10+, Ubuntu 20.04+ as well as the latest Fedora releases.

At Mullvad, we believe that privacy is a universal right and fundamental to a flourishing society. Mullvad is owned by our parent company, Amagicom, which comes from the Sumerian word ama-gi and is the oldest known word for
. Both companies are owned by founders Fredrik Strömberg and Daniel Berntsson.
